item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 21st January
item.description:
The tree outside No.19 roots are damaging and lifting the pavement. They have now reached the house's boundary wall. I am now worried this is going to damage my wall, drive and property.

item.title: Grass verge damaged by cars driving onto pathway, 21st January
item.description:
The grass verge has been seriously damaged by cars driving onto the path to park on the grass verge, This has caused deep unsightly holes in the grass verge and has smeared mud across the paths making walking safely near impossible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princess Elizabeth Way, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
